name: Amazon Kinesis Firehose
description: Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose is a fully managed service for delivering real-time streaming data to destinations such as Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3), Amazon Redshift, Amazon Elasticsearch Service (Amazon ES), and Splunk.

key concepts.name: delivery stream
key concepts.description: The base unit of kinesis firehose.  You send data to a delivery stream

key concepts.name: record
key concepts.description: The data sent to the stream.  It can be as large as 1000KB

key concepts.name: data producer
key concepts.description: The thing that sends data: a web server that sends logs, etc...

key concepts.name: buffer size
key concepts.description: Data is buffered in the stream before sending along.  Buffer sizes are in MB

key concepts.name: buffer interval
key concepts.description: Data is buffered in the stream before sending along.  Buffer intervals are in seconds
